synopsis.text: Layla, Anna, May, Mia, and Rosetta take center stage in this special introduction, hosted by none other than Sora Naegino! In this unique OVA, your favorite characters are reimagined as charming chibis, ready to entertain and educate. Witness the dynamic duo Marion and Jonathan demonstrate the importance of teamwork and communication. Feeling hungry? May Wong will be whipping up a delectable dish for you to try at home. And for those who have ever wanted to learn some seal language or master the diabolo, Rosetta's got you covered with beginner tips and tricks. So, grab a snack, kick back, and enjoy this delightful show packed with fun, laughter, and learning!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
